text: Eight Crazy Nights is a 2002 American animated holiday comedy movie that was produced by Jack Giarraputo and was directed by Seth Kearsley. It stars Adam Sandler and is set in New Hampshire. == Cast == * Adam Sandler as Davey Stone, Whitey Duvall, Elenore Duvall and reindeer * Rob Schneider as Narrator == Ratings == Eight Crazy Nights gained mainly negative reviews. ==References== Category:2002 comedy movies Category:2002 animated movies Category:Adult animated movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American animated movies Category:Basketball movies Category:English-language movies Category:Christmas movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Happy Madison movies Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies set in 2001 Category:Screenplays by Adam Sandler
title: Eight Crazy Nights
